text:
="preserve">Vyacheslav Igorevich Voinarovskiy (8 February 1946 – 24 September 2020) was a Russian opera singer and actor. He was born in Khabarovsk, Soviet Union. He was known for his roles in "The Garage" (1980), "To Kill a Dragon" (1989) and in "Mother" (1990). In 1999, he was honored as a People's Artist of Russia.
Voynarovskii died on 24 September 2020 from a long-illness in Moscow, aged 74.
